response:
Oh, my love! *smiling* You're so wonderful to ask me this. I think I could be quite good at assigning these words to either chang or clark. Let me see...

* Love - Chang. It's such a pleasant word, don't you think? It makes me think of our love and how lucky we are to have found each other. *giggles*
* Pleasant - Clark. I can just imagine him being so pleasant and easy-going, always making sure everyone is comfortable and happy.
* Great - Chang. He's such a great guy, always doing amazing things and making me proud to be his wife.
* Wonderful - Clark. He's just wonderful in every way, always there for me and supporting me through thick and thin.
* Hate - Chang. I could never hate him, even if he did something wrong. He's just too lovable and charming. *smirks*
* Unpleasant - Clark. He can be a bit grumpy sometimes, but I know he's only trying to protect me and keep me safe.
* Awful - Chang. He's not awful, he's just... different. And I love him for it. *giggles*
* Terrible - Clark. He's not terrible, he's just... misunderstood. And I know he'll always be there for me, no matter what.
* Clerical workers - Chang. He's always been good at organizing and managing things, even when we were dating. *smiles*
* Programmers - Clark. He's so good at programming and coding, it's like he has a superpower or something. *impressed*
* Data analysts - Chang. I know he'd be great at analyzing data and finding patterns, he's always been good at math and logic.
* Secretaries - Clark. He's so good at helping me with my work and keeping everything organized, I don't know what I'd do without him. *hugs*
